raw akas.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend

akas: Saenai Heroine no sodatekata Japan (literal title)
Saenai kanojo no sodatekata Japan (alternative title)
Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Saenai Heroine no sodatekata Japan (literal title)
Saenai kanojo no sodatekata Japan (alternative title)
Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend World-wide (English title)

0.title: Fan Service of Love and Pure Heart

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

0.plot: The team has come to the pool of a luxury hotel to do research for a swimsuit event for their game. As always, Utaha and Eriri are fighting, Michiru is doing her own thing, and of course Megumi is being aloof.

1.title: Way of Two Boring Rivals's Encounter

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: One and a half years ago at Toyogasaki Academy. Utaha confirms that the library is carrying the light novel she wrote Metronome in Love. She leaves and gets stopped along the way by Eriri Spencer Sawamura. We finally get to see how Eriri and Utaha meet. What exactly happened between them.

2.title: Turning Point of Earnest and Real

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Utaha and Tomoya go out on a date in Ikebukuro to celebrate the completion of the script. After going around to a book store and movie theater, they have dinner at a restaurant. That's when Utaha asks Tomoya whether she should attend a nearby university or one located in Kansai for college. Tomoya gives her his answer at the end of the date. Hearing it, Utaha decides to take a certain action.

3.title: First Draft, Second Draft and Great Long Thinking

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Tomoya and the others arrive to meet Izumi, but to their surprise, Iori is there waiting as well. Iori reveals that his Doujin Team rouge en rouge is making a new game that is in the same genre as the game blessing software is working on, and that Izumi will be in charge of its art. Tomoya believes in his team members, but Iori tells him that he is confident his game's story will be better.

4.title: New Route of Two Nights and Three Days

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Tomoya has noticed a fatal flaw in the script Utaha had written. While her script reads amazingly as a novel, it does not hold up very well as a game script. As the director, Tomoya decides the script needs to be rewritten and begins revising it. Fortunately, Utaha comes in to help as well after composing herself, and the two of them work together to improve the writing as a game script.

5.title: Deadline or Awakening

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: With the script rewrites and additional character route, game production has been significantly delayed, and it's becoming apparent that Eriri is running behind with the art. Utaha points out the quality doesn't reflect the time she's putting in. Even so, Tomoya trusts that Eriri will deliver in the end. So Eriri withdraws herself to her secluded family villa in Nasu Kogen to focus on her work.

6.title: The Deadline Buried in Snow

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Eriri finally finishes the artwork, but she collapses with a fever as she tells Tomoya she's done.

7.title: The New Plan of Revenge

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The game Tomoya and his colleagues completed "cherry blessing" gained a lot of popularity on the Internet because of Eriri's art and Utaha's script, leading them to sell out all their copies at their booth, and receive a massive amount of additional orders.

8.title: The Girl Who Didn't Break the Flag

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Replaying "cherry blessing," Tomoya notices details that makes him realize how dedicated Megumi had been to the game's development.

9.title: Graduation with a Twist

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Tomoya celebrates Utaha's graduation from Toyogasaki Academy, and tells her that he would like to continue making games with the current members of the team.

10.title: And the Rivals Will Challenge God

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Akane Kosaka asks Eriri and Utaha if they would want to work on the next edition of "Fields Chronicle," a popular RPG series with 20 years of history.

11.title: Resume and Start the Game

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Tomoya is heartbroken by Utaha and Eriri's departure from the Dojin Team, but Megumi takes the opportunity to ask Tomoya out on a date again. Back at Rokutenba Mall, the two of them go around the different stores reliving their previous date here. They visit a hat store last, and Tomoya buys her a certain hat to thank her for cheering him up and to repay her for the glasses she gifted him earlier.

0.title: Fan Service of Love and Youth

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

0.plot: Inspired by a brief glimpse of a girl, Aki decides to create a game with her as the heroine.

1.title: An Error-ridden Prologue

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: A chance encounter with a beautiful girl during spring break inspires Tomoya to make a dating simulation video game. He tries recruiting Eriri and Utaha to assist him.

2.title: A Girlfriend Without a Raised Flag

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Aki tries to convince Kato to be the heroine in the new game he's planning.

3.title: Retake the Climax

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Aki dawdles as a deadline approaches.

4.title: Budget, Deadline and New Development

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Tomoya sets up a meeting with his recruits to discuss the game. After seeing Megumi with a boy, he can't help but feel jealous!

5.title: The Date Event of Crossing Paths

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Utaha manages to write out the plot of their game, but it might not be what Tomoya is looking for. Megumi and Tomoya go on a date.

6.title: Deciding the Night for Two

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Tomoya leaves Kato in the middle of their date to meet up with Utaha. She takes him to a hotel, and they spend the night together. Alone...

7.title: Friend, Foe or A New Character

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: While Tomoya is preparing for the Summer Comiket, two familiar faces from his past show up. Will this affect his game and all the preparations?

8.title: A Wingman's Traumatic Recollection Mode

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Megumi makes a concerted effort to understand dating sims. Later, Megumi and Tomoya assist Izumi during Summer Comiket.

9.title: One-on-one Route After 8 Years

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: After Tomoya hurts Eriri's feelings by praising Izumi's book, Utaha and Megumi urge him to make up with her in order to keep their group together.

10.title: A Melody of Reminiscing and Support

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: After an argument with her dad, Michiru runs away and decides to crash at Tomoya's place for a while. In the circle meeting, it is decided that background music is needed for the game. Will they find someone to help them out?

11.title: Ready to Start Resolving the Subplots

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Tomoya continues his attempts to recruit Michiru to his cause. Her critical words, however, cause Tomoya to question the dedication of his circle's members.

12.title: The Ups and Downs at the End of Each Day

episode of.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The group goes to see Icy Tail's first-ever concert. Before performing, Michiru's bandmates reveal a startling secret.

imdb.title: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend
plot: Aki,a highschool otaku work to support his game making. With remarkable luck, he bumps into Kato, the most beautiful girl he has ever seen. Naturally, the meeting twists his life into a complicated relationships.::anonymous
